required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Adjuvant Study of Pyrotinib in HER-2 Positive Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Adjuvant Trastuzumab Plus Pyrotinib for Residual Invasive HER2-positive Breast Cancer After Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Plus Anti-HER2 Target Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, randomised, multicenter, no placebo-controlled, open label study for evaluating the efficacy and safety of pyrotinib in women with residual invasive HER2-positive breast cancer after neoadjuvant chemotherapy plus anti-HER2 target therapy. The main purpose is to investigate whether pyrotinib can further reduce the risk of recurrence from previously diagnosed HER-2 positive breast cancer based on the 1-year trastuzumab standard adjuvant treatment with or without pertuzumab.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization until time of event up to 2 years.
primary_outcome.description: Invasive disease-free survival time is defined as the time from date of randomization until the first invasive disease recurrence of the following events: invasive ipsilateral breast tumor recurrence, invasive contralateral breast cancer, local/regional invasive recurrence, distant recurrence and death from any cause.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization until time of event up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Disease-free survival time is defined as the time from date of randomization until the first disease recurrence of the following events: invasive ipsilateral breast tumor recurrence, invasive contralateral breast cancer, local/regional invasive recurrence, non-breast primary invasive cancer, ductal carcinoma in situ(DCIS),or distant recurrence and death from any cause

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization until time of event up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Overall survival is defined as the time from randomization to death from any cause.

arm_group.description: pyrotinib 400 mg, orally once daily for one year

intervention.description: pyrotinib 400 mg, orally once daily for one year

facility.name: Renji Hospital, School of Medicine, Shanghai Jiao Tong University
